Ultra Magnum turned back. He'd thought he heard something, but didn't
have =
anything to confirm it. By now, someone should have heard about
him. There =
must be some watch being done on him. He grinned slyly.

He took a step bac=
k, then transformed. He started rolling slowly,
intent on leaving this part=
 of town to visit the slums on the north
side. Just in case, a small round =
orb popped up on the back of his
trailer. He would see if somebody was behi=
nd him...
